function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate crises, biodiversity loss, air pollution, and other sustainable challenges","Impact":"Continued urgent challenges and potential exacerbation of environmental and public health issues","Mitigation":"Implementation of nature-based solutions, sustainable practices, and technology-driven strategies","Technologies":"Nature-based solutions, sustainable building materials, energy-efficient systems, air quality monitoring, and biodiversity enhancement technologies","People":"Public, urban residents, and environmental stakeholders","Owner":"Government bodies, urban planners, architects, and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Limited research on the impact of nature-based design in architecture","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the effectiveness and potential risks of nature-based design in architecture","Mitigation":"Funding and support for research, investment in pilot projects, and collaboration between architects and environmental scientists","Technologies":"Research and modeling tools, data analytics, and simulation software for assessing the impact of nature-based design","People":"Architects, environmental scientists, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, and architectural firms"},{"Description":"Significant impact of buildings on human health and well-being","Impact":"Potential negative effects on public health and well-being due to indoor environment quality and building materials","Mitigation":"Adoption of sustainable building practices, use of non-toxic materials, improvement of indoor air quality, and promotion of natural light and ventilation","Technologies":"Smart building systems, air purification technologies, sustainable construction materials, and indoor environmental quality monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, public health organizations, and construction industry stakeholders","Owner":"Architects, building developers, and public health agencies"}]}
